title: Music Review: 'Here is Barbara Lynn' Reissue
teaser: Singer and guitarist Barbara Lynn is well-known for her classic late '60s soul music sound. Back then, she toured with James Brown and Otis Redding, and appeared on American Bandstand. Now, Atlantic Records has reissued her third album on vinyl.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
